title: The future of travel and a Friend of Pivot on telehealth
description:
Kara and Scott talk about the biggest weekend for airlines since the pandemic started and what that means for the industry. They are joined by Hims/Hers CEO Andrew Dudum to talk about how telehealth surged in the past year and his decision to take the company public as a SPAC.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
